level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: For purposes of this subchapter, the terms "Mayor," "Council," "District," "agency," "rule," "rulemaking," "person," "party," "order," "relief," "proceeding," "public record," and "adjudication" shall have the meaning as provided in § 2-502.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-96
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-96, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-531.
